CustomField.description: Formula field indicating whether maintenance is current, due soon, or overdue
CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(Next_Maintenance_Due__c), "Not Scheduled", IF(Next_Maintenance_Due__c < TODAY(), "Overdue", IF(Next_Maintenance_Due__c <= TODAY() + 30, "Due Soon", "Current")))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Automatically calculated based on Next Maintenance Date
CustomField.label: Maintenance Status
